## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                          | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `option` | `option`  | When set to `fill`, content will fill the whole space of the widget. | `"fill"` | `undefined` |
